origin.esoterica-origins..description: A mighty youkai that is very protective of sunflowers.
origin.esoterica-origins..name: Sunflower Youkai
power.esoterica-origins.active_resistanc: Activate to gain Resistance for 30 seconds every minute.
Activate to gain Strength for 30 seconds every minute.
power.esoterica-origins.active_strength2: Activate to gain Strength II for 30 seconds every 80 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.akyuu/book_craft: You can craft books without using leather.
Lose 1 heart permanently and prevent death every 60 minutes, up to 5 hearts.
power.esoterica-origins.akyuu/keepinvent: You keep items and experience on death.
Every 30 seconds, activate to shoot a laser that deals 8 magic damage and applies Wither for 10 seconds to the target creature within 32 blocks.
Iron and snow golems within 16 blocks gain Regeneration for 30 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.alice/heal_ray.d: Every 90 seconds, activate to gain Flawless for 1 second and shoot a beam that heals 3 hearts. Undead are dealt 20 damage instead.
power.esoterica-origins.burnable.descrip: You take double damage from fire.
power.esoterica-origins.burnable.name: Burnable
power.esoterica-origins.byakuren/explosi: Deal 8 extra area damage with your bare fist at 1 attack speed.
power.esoterica-origins.byakuren/iron_sk: Gain 10 armor if you have Resistance or Absorption.
power.esoterica-origins.byakuren/nodiamo: You move 20% faster unless you are in possession of diamond or netherite items.
power.esoterica-origins.clownpiece_stren: Activate to give every entity within 25 blocks, including yourself, Strength II and Absorption for 30 seconds every 2 minutes.
power.esoterica-origins.clownpiece_torch: With a torch in hand, other entities within 16 blocks in line of sight gain Weakness II or Levitation or are set on fire for 3 seconds every second randomly.
power.esoterica-origins.cold_weak.descri: You gain Weakness in cold biomes.
power.esoterica-origins.cold_weak.name: Cold Weakness
Can fly as if in Creative Mode.
power.esoterica-origins.doremy/haste_aft: Restore hunger and gain Haste for 20 minutes after waking up.
power.esoterica-origins.doremy/keep_curs: Items with Curse of Vanishing stay in your inventory after death instead.
power.esoterica-origins.doremy/sleepy.de: Gain Slowness unless you have Speed or Haste.
power.esoterica-origins.doremy/stand_sti: Gain Resistance II after not walking for 10 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.end_vulnerabilit: You take double damage from end creatures.
power.esoterica-origins.fast_normal_temp: You move 10% faster in temperate climate biomes.
power.esoterica-origins.festive_dining.d: You gain slowness for 30 seconds after eating.
You take 50% more damage from fire.
power.esoterica-origins.flandre_damage.d: You deal double melee damage to entities with full health.
Instantly produce a destructive, fiery explosion that doesn't damage yourself.
power.esoterica-origins.flawless.descrip: You cannot take more than 1 damage at once.
power.esoterica-origins.flawless.name: Flawless
power.esoterica-origins.flower_power.des: Whilst near flowers, regenerate health passively and gain strength for 15 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.fly.description: You can fly as if with an elytra.
power.esoterica-origins.fly.name: Flight
power.esoterica-origins.forest_defense.d: Activate to gain absorption when near logs and resistance for 30 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.forest_power.des: When near logs or leaves, regenerate health passively and gain haste.
power.esoterica-origins.fragile_lunarian: Your lunar body is delicate, reducing your health to 3 hearts.
power.esoterica-origins.fragiler_lunaria: Your lunar body is delicate, reducing your health to 2 hearts.
power.esoterica-origins.frost_armor.desc: When near snow or ice blocks, gain 10 Armor and Resistance for 20 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.frost_armor.name: Frost Armor
power.esoterica-origins.god_fist.descrip: Deal 9 extra damage with your bare fist at 1 attack speed.
power.esoterica-origins.god_fist.name: Fist of the Goddess
Gain extra food points from eating but you cannot eat meat.
power.esoterica-origins.hakurei_fist.des: Deal 8 extra damage with your fists at 1.2 attack speed.
power.esoterica-origins.hecatia_heal.des: Activate to fully heal every 10 minutes. Gain creative flight whilst charging or +2 hearts when charged. Activates before death.
power.esoterica-origins.hina/gather_misf: Every 5 seconds, heal a heart for other players and villagers within 32 blocks.
power.esoterica-origins.hina/inject_misf: Activate to apply Wither for 8 seconds to the target creature within 32 blocks every 60 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.hina/wither_dama: All entities within 16 blocks that have Wither take additional 2 damage per second, including yourself.
power.esoterica-origins.hunger_in_daylig: You get hungry after being in daylight.
Sprinting is disabled earlier when hungry or when under the Hunger effect.
power.esoterica-origins.insomnia.name: Insomnia
power.esoterica-origins.junko_antiflawle: You take 80% less damage from entities with Flawless.
power.esoterica-origins.junko_fury.descr: After dealing damage 9 times, deal triple damage on your next hit and gain Resistance IV for 5 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.junko_fury.name: Pure Furies
power.esoterica-origins.kanako/absorptio: Every 10 seconds when you take damage, consume 1 Faith to gain Absorption for 15 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.kanako/faith.des: You can gather up to 20 Faith Points.
power.esoterica-origins.kanako/faith_buf: You gain Resistance for up to 60 seconds at 10 or more Faith and have 4 less hearts without any Faith.
power.esoterica-origins.kanako/faith_dam: You deal double damage at 20 Faith, consuming 2 Faith.
power.esoterica-origins.kanako/gather_fa: Every second, every living entity within 16 blocks has a 4% chance to give you 1 Faith.
power.esoterica-origins.kanako/only_ches: You can only wear a chestplate.
power.esoterica-origins.kanako/pillager_: Gain 4 Faith and Hero of the Village for 10 minutes after killing an illager.
power.esoterica-origins.kappa_backpack.d: You have a backpack, letting you carry another 9 items with you.
power.esoterica-origins.kedama_fluffen.d: Briefly gain Strength on hit, stacking up to Strength II. Does not refresh the duration.
power.esoterica-origins.kedama_fluffy.de: You gain Absorption for 10 seconds after taking damage every 5 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.keiki_aura.descr: Iron and snow golems within 16 blocks gain Regeneration for 30 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.keiki_aura.name: Aura of Creation
power.esoterica-origins.keine/fullmoon_h: You are forced into hakutaku form during a full moon.
power.esoterica-origins.keine/hakutaku_b: Whilst in hakutaku form, you move 20% faster and deal 4 more melee damage but cannot wear any armor.
power.esoterica-origins.keine/hakutaku_h: Gain Weakness for 20 minutes and Hunger for 1 minute after exiting Hakutaku form.
power.esoterica-origins.keine/haste_stan: Gain Haste when standing still in human form.
power.esoterica-origins.koishi/fugue.des: Charges upon breaking blocks. Gain creative flight when active.
power.esoterica-origins.koishi/mental_st: Performing certain actions charges one of the mental states. Once charged, deactivate other mental states and gain a buff for 60 seconds while active.
power.esoterica-origins.koishi/passion.d: Charges upon dealing 2 or more damage. Deal and take 100% more damage when active.
Charges slowly passively. Lose all charge upon taking damage if not active. Take 50% less damage when active.
power.esoterica-origins.larva/enlightenm: Right Click with a Totem of Undying to consume it and grant players within 8 blocks Health Boost for an hour.
power.esoterica-origins.larva/poison_clo: Create a large poison cloud with a radius of 8 blocks for 15 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.larva/poison_dam: You deal 50% more melee damage to enemies affected by poison.
power.esoterica-origins.maribel.descript: You start with an ender eye in inventory and have alternative ender eye recipes.
power.esoterica-origins.maribel.name: What's this?
power.esoterica-origins.marisa/charge.de: Slowly gain charge after dealing damage. When at full charge, gain Absorption and deal triple damage for 10 seconds.
You have additional potion ingredient recipes.
Activate to shoot an explosive fireball every 30 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.marisa/food.desc: You gain more food points from all foods whilst in a dark oak forest.
power.esoterica-origins.marisa/food.name: Forest Dwellers
power.esoterica-origins.marisa/hoarder.d: You have access to an additional 9 slots of inventory.
power.esoterica-origins.marisa/potion.de: Activate to throw an Instant Damage II or a 10-second Wither II potion randomly.
power.esoterica-origins.medicine/heal_hi: Hit an entity with a flower to deal 4 additional damage but give it Regeneration II for 15 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.medicine/lethal_: All entities within 5 blocks that have less than 3 hearts are afflicted with Wither II.
power.esoterica-origins.medicine/poison_: All entities within 8 blocks are afflicted by Poison.
Every 30 seconds, you take 50% less damage from the next hit and the attacker gains Poison II for 30 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.medicine/wither_: You can craft a wither rose from a lily of the valley.
power.esoterica-origins.mike/double_ores: You gain doubled drops from emerald, gold and diamond ores.
power.esoterica-origins.mike/keepinv.des: Items with Fortune III or Looting III are kept after death.
power.esoterica-origins.mike/no_silk_tou: Cannot dig blocks with silk touch tools.
power.esoterica-origins.miko/golden_spee: You move 10% faster whilst holding a golden item or a totem of undying.
power.esoterica-origins.miko/postmortal_: After having used a totem of undying, you permanently take 1 less damage from all sources.
power.esoterica-origins.minoriko/crop_gr: Crops and saplings next to you grow instantly.
power.esoterica-origins.minoriko/sun_foo: Food gives extra food points when eaten in sunlight.
power.esoterica-origins.misumaru/armor_i: Gain 2 armor for having each of these status effects: Strength, Resistance, Absorption.
power.esoterica-origins.misumaru/open_cr: Activate to open a crafting table.
power.esoterica-origins.misumaru/strengt: Apply Strength for 60 seconds to players within 8 blocks after dealing projectile damage.
power.esoterica-origins.mokou_aflame.des: Shoot fireballs in all directions and gain Strength II for 20 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.nether_damage.de: You deal 25% more damage whilst in the nether.
power.esoterica-origins.nightbug_swarm.d: Deal 10 extra damage and apply Poison II for 10 seconds on your next melee hit every 60 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.no_armor.name: No Armor
power.esoterica-origins.nostrength_nospr: Sprinting is disabled unless you have Strength.
power.esoterica-origins.okuu/firepunch.d: Enemies hit in melee are lit on fire for 8 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.okuu/heat.descri: You have a heat bar. Lose 1% heat per second passively. Gain 4% heat per second in lava, lose 4% heat per second in water.
power.esoterica-origins.okuu/heat.name: Heat
power.esoterica-origins.okuu/heat_damage: Every second, if at over 10% heat, deal damage and lose heat to/for each creature within 16 blocks. Deal more damage and lose more heat the higher your heat is.
power.esoterica-origins.okuu/heat_nearby: Every second, gain 1% heat for each creature within 16 blocks on fire.
power.esoterica-origins.okuu/meltdown.de: When at 100% heat and you have Slowness, explode violently instantly.
power.esoterica-origins.okuu/overheat.de: At 80% or more heat, gain Slowness for 4 seconds whenever you take damage.
power.esoterica-origins.oni_physique.des: You deal 20% more damage and have 20% more health.
power.esoterica-origins.optical_camoufla: Gain Invisibility and Resistance II for 30 seconds upon activation, every 90 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.orin_resist_unde: You take half as much damage from undead.
power.esoterica-origins.pacifist.name: Pacifist
power.esoterica-origins.pain_threshold.d: Taking damage gives you hunger. Gain weakness if at less than 10 hearts.
power.esoterica-origins.parsee_defense.d: You take half as much damage from enemies with 6 hearts or more.
power.esoterica-origins.parsee_wither.de: All nearby entities within line of sight that have 10 or more hearts are afflicted with Wither.
power.esoterica-origins.patchy/flight.de: You gain creative flight whilst Magical Catalyst is recharging
power.esoterica-origins.patchy/primary.d: Right click every 10 seconds to consume the item in hand and cast a spell: Fire Charge = Fireball, Ice = Freeze Ray, Book = Absorption, Iron Ingot = Resistance, Gold Ingot = Regeneration.
power.esoterica-origins.patchy/resistanc: You take 80% less damage from magic, drowning, fire and freezing.
You cannot be affected by poison.
power.esoterica-origins.poison_wither_im: You cannot be affected by Poison nor by the Wither effect.
power.esoterica-origins.purification.des: Activate to cleanse all status effects with minimal cooldown.
power.esoterica-origins.ranged_inability: You deal half as much damage with all projectiles.
power.esoterica-origins.reimu_exterminat: You get a Smite III iron sword and deal 25% more damage to undead.
power.esoterica-origins.remilia_diet.des: Can only eat extravagant and exotic foods such as golden carrots, cakes, tropical fish or others.
power.esoterica-origins.remilia_flawless: Gain Flawless for 30 seconds, making you take 1 damage at most, at a two minute cooldown
Toggle applying Blindness to all entities within 16 blocks, including yourself.
power.esoterica-origins.rumia/darkness.d: Activate to apply Darkness for 30 seconds to yourself and entities within 8 blocks with a cooldown of 90 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.rumia/darkness_f: You gain creative flight whilst under the effects of Darkness.
power.esoterica-origins.rumia/invisibili: You gain invisibility whilst under the effects of Blindness or Darkness.
power.esoterica-origins.rumia/resistance: You take 80% less damage from entities more than 4 blocks away whilst under Blindness or Darkness.
power.esoterica-origins.sage/alchemy_exp: Immune to most negative effects. Absorption provides 2 extra hearts.
power.esoterica-origins.sage/projectile_: All projectiles deal 2 extra damage. Spectral arrows heal 2 hearts and apply Flawless for 5 seconds instead of dealing damage.
power.esoterica-origins.sagume_mining.de: Upon breaking a block, if you have Mining Fatigue, clear it and gain Haste V for 5 seconds. Otherwise, clear Haste and gain Mining Fatigue for 5 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.sagume_resistanc: Whenever you take or deal 1 or more damage, the victim gains Resistance IV for 3 seconds.
Gain Regeneration and Speed for 60 minutes after killing a Wither or an Ender Dragon.
power.esoterica-origins.sakuya/life_dama: Every 30 seconds, activate to lose 5 hearts and deal double damage for 30 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.sakuya/no_natura: You don't have natural health regeneration.
power.esoterica-origins.sakuya/resistanc: You take 80% less damage from kinetic damage sources, suffocation and fire.
power.esoterica-origins.sakuya/timed.des: Every 30 seconds, if you break a block or deal damage in the last 500 ms, gain Haste, Speed and Strength for 30 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/active_mir: Activate to gain Resistance & Absorption, Strength & Haste, Speed & Dolphin's Grace or Regeneration & Saturation for 60 seconds randomly and use 4 Faith.
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/active_tot: Right Click on a Totem of Undying or a Nether Star to gain Flawless for 5 minutes and consume 10 Faith.
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/faith.desc: You can gather up to 10 Faith Points.
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/faith.name: Faith
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/faith_armo: Gain 4, 10 and 20 total armor points when you have 2, 5 and 8 or more Faith respectively.
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/faith_diss: Every 2 seconds, lose 1 Faith if you are not at full health.
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/gather_fai: Every second, if you don't have Flawless, every living entity within 32 blocks within line of sight has a 2% chance to give you 1 Faith.
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/moriya_ble: You receive 50% more healing from all sources and have passive regeneration that doesn't use up saturation.
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/nofaith_fr: You have 3 less hearts if you don't have any Faith.
power.esoterica-origins.sanae/slow_armor: You move 15% slower if wearing armor better than leather.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/anti_a: You deal 50% more melee and projectile damage against phantoms, blazes, ghasts and vexes.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/anti_g: You deal 50% extra melee and projectile damage to enemies affected by Glowing.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/luna_n: You have 4 less hearts unless exposed to the night sky.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/luna_s: You do not produce vibrations. Gain Speed for a second whenever you would've produced a vibration.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/moving: While not moving, you deal 25% more melee and projectile damage to entities moving horizontally.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/optica: Gain Invisibility and Resistance for 30 seconds upon activation, every 2 minutes.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/star_p: Whilst exposed to the clear night sky, projectiles inflict Glowing for 30 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/sun_ar: You gain 8 armor whilst in daylight.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/sun_fo: Food gives extra food points when eaten in sunlight.
power.esoterica-origins.sanyousei/sun_we: You gain Weakness when exposed to the sun.
power.esoterica-origins.satori/invis_or_: Activate to gain Strength, or Invisibility if sneaking, for 20 seconds every 60 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.satori/passive_h: Every 7 seconds, other players and tamed creatures within 16 blocks regain 1 health.
power.esoterica-origins.satori/slowness_: Activate to apply Slowness 5 for 8 seconds to the target creature within 32 blocks every 60 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.seiga/enchanting: Apply Mending and Curse of Vanishing to the held tool upon killing a mob.
power.esoterica-origins.seiga/phasing.de: You can phase through most blocks.
power.esoterica-origins.snow_spawn.descr: You spawn in a snowy plains biome.
power.esoterica-origins.snow_spawn.name: Spirit of Winter
power.esoterica-origins.summon_end_cryst: You can summon an end crystal to your location every 2 minutes.
power.esoterica-origins.summon_snowgolem: You can summon a snow golem every 2 minutes.
Gain Resistance II for 15 seconds when there are at least 3 sunflowers nearby.
power.esoterica-origins.sunflower_satura: You regain saturation by being near sunflowers and cannot eat any food.
power.esoterica-origins.suwako/faith_con: While at 5 or more faith, gain Conduit Power.
power.esoterica-origins.suwako/frog_bles: You receive double healing from all sources and have passive regeneration that consumes 1 Faith every second.
power.esoterica-origins.suwako/gather_fa: Every 8 seconds, gain 2 Faith if in water or 1 Faith.
power.esoterica-origins.suwako/iron_buff: Your attack speed is increased by 20% with iron weapons.
power.esoterica-origins.tengu/graze_with: Every 30 seconds, gain Graze I for 60 seconds if not wearing armor.
power.esoterica-origins.tengu/insomnia_w: You cannot sleep unless you have weakness.
power.esoterica-origins.tengu/megumu_abi: Build up charge slowly whilst exposed to the clear night sky. Activate to gain Regeneration, Resistance and Absorption III for multiple minutes.
power.esoterica-origins.tengu/megumu_gra: Every 60 seconds, upon taking damage, give all players within 16 blocks Graze II for 60 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.tengu/megumu_hit: Enemies hit in melee gain Weakness and Slowness for 20 seconds.
As a Tengu you move 10% faster.
power.esoterica-origins.tengu/shield_dam: Your melee attacks deal 1 extra damage and you gain 2 armor with a shield equipped.
power.esoterica-origins.tengu/trouble_at: You have a 3% chance to gain Bad Omen for 20 minutes every minute.
power.esoterica-origins.tengu/wind_god_g: Every 10 seconds, upon taking damage, gain Graze I for 60 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.tengu/workaholic: You can only eat if you have Slowness or your food level is 10 or lower.
power.esoterica-origins.tsukasa/sneaking: Gain Jump Boost II when sneaking.
power.esoterica-origins.tsukasa/villager: Gain Hero of the Village for 1 minute upon killing any entity.
power.esoterica-origins.tsukasa/water_de: Gain Slowness for 10 seconds when in water.
power.esoterica-origins.vampire_heal.des: Heal yourself by 1 health after hitting another entity.
power.esoterica-origins.wither_insectici: You gain Weakness and Slowness while under the effects of Wither.
power.esoterica-origins.yamame/active_we: Activate every 60 seconds to web an enemy, giving them Slowness V for 15 seconds.
power.esoterica-origins.yamame/active_wi: Activate every 2 minutes to inflict Wither II for 30 seconds on all poisoned entities within 16 blocks.
You have a simplified scaffolding recipe and can craft chainmail armor from strings.
power.esoterica-origins.yamame/poison_hi: You inflict Poison for 30 seconds upon dealing melee damage.
power.esoterica-origins.yukari_keepinven: After having visited the End, keep items and experience on death unless you are in the End.
Activate every 60 seconds to teleport target entity within 64 blocks 50 blocks into the air. Teleport yourself instead if sneaking.
